DOC.detailed_description: Patients ( 10 per dose level ) randomize receive 1 4 dos 935U83 every 8 hour 12 week . Five patient dose level must complete 4 week treatment without serious toxicity subsequent patient enter next high dose . If lack antiretroviral effect unacceptable toxicity demonstrate particular dose level , dose regimen may adjust .
